personal.name: Lars
personal.title: Computer Science Student & Developer
personal.description: Currently pursuing Master's degree in Computer Science at TUM and working as a developer at Vector Informatik. Passionate about mixed reality, path planning, and automotive technology.

education.description: Focusing on advanced computer science topics including artificial intelligence, software engineering, and system design.

thesis.title: Intelligent and Automated Path-Planning with Mixed Reality for Mobile Systems within Hospital Environments

education.description: Comprehensive study of computer science fundamentals with specialization in mixed reality and automated systems.
Completed secondary education with focus on mathematics and sciences.

experience.description: Working on DYNA4, developing advanced simulation software for autonomous driving testing. Contributing to core features including OpenSCENARIO and OpenDRIVE support, implementing robust C++ and Python solutions for automotive simulation environments.
achievements: Contributed to automotive software development projects
Working on DYNA4 simulation environment development

engagement.description: Active member of LYMINA, contributing to musical performances and creative projects. Participating in live performances and music production.
Member of Kunst? e.V. Taufkirchen, engaging in cultural and artistic activities within the local community.
Active member of the Ukulele Orchestra Dorfen, participating in regular performances and community events. Contributing to the musical diversity of the local area.
Participated in 'Jugend Musiziert' competition, demonstrating musical skills and dedication to artistic development.
